channel.title: Hooks :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Inline and event hooks Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 758 Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: Internal app builders Description: An overview of event and inline hooks, what they are, and some basic use cases. Establish the difference between hooks and the Workflows platform, and then provide a link to the more detailed “How to Implement a hook section” (ID: 660)
